abstract: Editorial holds that public hearings held by New York's legislative redistricting committee are a sham; says overriding purpose is to protect party majorities and incumbents, often for life; urges Gov Cuomo to push for truly independent commission that will serve public interest.
snippet: New York’s redistricting issues should be resolved by serving the public’s interest instead of party majorities and incumbents.
lead_paragraph: New York’s redistricting issues should be resolved by serving the public’s interest instead of party majorities and incumbents.
